title: Bangkok Life Assurance returns to PEACH for another successful Annual Sales Seminar
text:
Bangkok Life Assurance returns to PEACH for another successful Annual Sales Seminar Bangkok Life Assurance returns to PEACH for another successful Annual Sales Seminar Details Category: Arenas and Conference Centres   12:15 Royal Cliff Hotels Group and the Pattaya Exhibition And Convention Hall (PEACH) has once again been the chosen venue for Bangkok Life Assurance PCL’s annual sales seminar on 28 -30 August 2015. Present during the opening ceremony were Mr. Chone Sophonpanich, President of Bangkok Life Assurance and Mr. Ruangsak Panyabodegun, Senior Executive Vice President of the Marketing Division of Bangkok Life Assurance PCL. Over 1,400 delegates came together for this exciting 3-day event that consisted of key plenary sessions, workshops and insightful talks from motivational speakers in Thailand’s most flexible and versatile convention venue. 
Hosted under the theme “Sky is the Limit”, this year’s seminar featured exclusive talks from Mr. Thunyawat Chaitrakulchai, a popular television host and financial consultant on the marketing prospects of 2015 and Mr. Neramit Srimuang, who talked about achieving multi-million business goals. “My team and I are truly pleased that Bangkok Life Assurance PCL has chosen to return to the Royal Cliff Hotels Group and PEACH to host their annual sales seminar 2015.” Mr. Vitanart Vathanakul, Executive Director of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group said. “We believe that this is a great opportunity for our property to showcase our world-class facilities and impeccable service to Thailand’s leading Life Insurance Company.” Reaffirming the property’s commitment to environmental conservation excellence, Royal Cliff has an exciting tree planting program where flames trees would be planted in various vital locations on behalf of the companies who select Royal Cliff Hotels Group or PEACH as the venue for their events. Mr. Chone Sophonpanich, President of Bangkok Life Assurance, received the “Tree Planting Certificate” from Mr. Antonello Passa, General Manager of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group. This long-lasting commitment to environmental sustainability reflects the company’s dedication to corporate social responsibility. Situated on a 64 acre private parkland estate overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has been honored with multiple awards and recognition from organizations of national and international repute. It is home to four award winning 5-star hotels offering a sensory experience defined profoundly by its style, culture and elegance - all presented with the distinctive spirit of the State of Exclusivity and Fascination.
